description: The superstar swimsuit and lingerie model Jessie Rogers gets an unexpected visit by a crazed fan. After she has him kicked out of the building where she is doing a photo shoot, he sneaks back in and captures his favorite model. Chained to the wall in a dirty boiler room, she must now entertain and please him by taking punishment and letting him fuck her helpless face, pussy and asshole!
title: The Model: Jessie Rogers gets taken by her biggest fan!
